explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions using machine learning approaches to rank risk factors in financial losses from railroad incidents.
explanations.supervised learning: The methods used (random forest, k-nearest neighbors, support vector machines, etc.) are all supervised learning techniques as they work with labeled data.
explanations.regression: The paper compares various regression methods including stepwise linear regression for analyzing the data.
explanations.support vector machine: Support vector machines (SVM) are one of the models compared in the study.
explanations.SVM: Abbreviation for support vector machine, which is one of the models used.
explanations.decision tree: Random forest and gradient boosting methods are based on decision trees, which are mentioned in the paper.
